EmailTemplate.name: ***INSERT PERSONALIZED SUBJECT*** (1495030764.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: ***INSERT PERSONALIZED SUBJECT*** (1495030764.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi Vanessa- To follow up on our previous reach out, I wanted to send you a recording to our Healthcare Best Practices webinar with Colorado Children's Hospital <[[https://turbonomic.com/thx-wbnr-recrd-best-practices-for-healthcare-data-centers/]]>. I think this webinar aligns particularly well with your area of focus and expertise as a Manager for Palmetto. - The unique challenges healthcare providers face in ensuring continuous availability of mission critical applications - The challenges of deploying and virtualizing Electronic Medical Record systems and VDI instances - How Children’s Hospital Colorado leverages Turbonomic to eliminate resource contention, maximize uptime and maintain a healthy data center If you would rather read, I suggest you take a look at the Turbonomic ROI Whitepaper <[[https://turbonomic.com/wp-content/uploads/Turbonomic_ROI.pdf]]>. As someone with a more strategic, business-oriented vantage point, I think you’ll find that it resonates. I'll follow up with a phone call on later this week to hear your thoughts – looking forward to speaking with you then! Best, Chris Boyd Account Executive | Southeast Office 857-305-4657 | Cell 901-502-1650 Why Two Tech Tycoons Fell in Love with Turbo <[[http://www.businessinsider.com/why-two-tech-tycoons-joined-turbonomic-2016-11]]>
